General.Name: Netronix
General.Description: Netronix, Inc. designs and manufactures network and e-Reader products in Taiwan and internationally. It also designs and sells ID, hardware, and software products, as well as provides electronic shelf labels and electron baggage tags. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 945, Boai Street, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 302
